title: How to prevent a temperature inversion - Quora

response.answer_text: You would need to be able to manipulate air masses on a tremendously large scale. And why would you even want to? Temperature inversions are part of the natural order of things and serve useful purposes, like pushing warmer air uphill where plants and animals could use a break from the cold. Beware the law of unintended consequences.

A temperature inversion is part of a weather system. Thus far, humans have neither the knowledge not the ability to manipulate any kind of weather systems - nor are we likely to be able to do so in the foreseeable future.
